title: Beauty Queen Mom Dead in Bathtub. Accident or MURDER?
itunes:title: Beauty Queen Mom Dead in Bathtub. Accident or MURDER?
description:
Michele MacNeill, wife of a respected Utah physician, is found dead in her bathtub. On medications while recovering from plastic surgery, the initial report was death by accidental drowning.

New clues lead to murder charges.  Who killed Michele MacNeill?

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Wendy Patrick:  Trial Attorney & author of “Red Flags”

Dr. Kris Sperry:  Retired Chief Medical Examiner for the State of Georgia  

Caryn Stark:  Psychologist

Steven Lampley :   Former detective

David Mack:    Syndicated Radio Host


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
